The '''Water Gun Technique''' is a technique used by the [[Hōzuki clan]].

== Usage ==
The user makes a [[Wikipedia:Finger gun|finger gun]] with their hand and, through the Hydrification Technique, compresses a drop of water in their index finger, firing it with tremendous force and speed similar to a gunshot — enough to easily pierce through a [[sand clone]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 556, page 11</ref>

== See Also ==
* [[Water Release: Water Spirit Wave]]

== Trivia ==
* Mangetsu uses a larger version of this technique in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]''.
* Suigetsu was seen threatening [[Sasuke Uchiha]] with this technique after he was freed. However, the technique was not named until it was used by the [[Second Mizukage]].
